condition.text: covid[- ]?19(?! info for buyers)|covid(?!-19 info for buyers)|corona[- ]?virus|face masks?|sars[- ]cov[- ]2|omicron|delta[- ]?variant|deltacron

actions.custom_note: Covid-19 Post Hidden ($0). Click to view.

filters.title: Covid-19 Filter
filters.description: Hide posts related to Covid-19. Show a placeholder where the post would have been, allowing you to click and view if you wish.

condition.text: (obama|trump|trumpies|trumpers|putin|pence|hillary clinton|bill clinton|bernie sanders|libertarian|green party|election|republican|republicans|democrat|democrats|democratic|politics|politician|clinton foundation|electoral|ben carson|giuliani|ivanka|inauguration|kellyanne conway|betsy devos|elizabeth warren|mitch mcConnell|biden|kushner|mueller report|kamala harris|buttigieg|beto o'rourke|andrew yang|cory booker|julian castro|julián castro|john delaney|gillibrand|hickenlooper|inslee|klobuchar|tim ryan|tulsi|gabbard|seth moulton|swalwell|marianne williamson|bill weld|william weld|maga|messam|michael bennet|mike gravel|stacey abrams|impeach|impeachment|impeached|congress|senate|pelosi|romney|oval office|limbaugh|william barr|bill barr|moscow mitch|gop|parnas|white house|dnc|rnc|coney barrett|qanon)

filters.title: Election/Politics 2020
filters.description: Filter posts related to U.S. Politics

actions.custom_note: Sponsored: click to show/hide post by '${author:60}'

filters.title: Hide Sponsored Posts
filters.description: Hide 'Sponsored' posts from the News Feed

filters.title: Hide Suggested Posts
filters.description: Hide various sorts of 'Suggested' posts in News & Groups Feeds (NOTE: English-language FB only)

filters.title: Create Game/App Tabs
filters.description: Create tabs for filtered views of posts by apps or games, but don't remove them from the News Feed

filters.title: Create Author Tabs
filters.description: Create tabs for filtered views of posts by different people, but don't remove them from the News Feed

filters.title: I F'ing Love ...
filters.description: Replace any Page names like 'I F'ing Love Science' with 'IFL'

actions.custom_note: Spoiler Alert! Click to show/hide this post.
actions.css: border:1px dashed red; font-size:12px; padding: 5px; opacity:1; margin:5px 0; color:red;

filters.title: Hide Spoilers
filters.description: If a post contains the word 'spoiler' anywhere in it, hide it and display a message to click to show the post.

filters.title: Hide 'Shared Memories'
filters.description: Hide re-posts of old memories in the News Feed

filters.title: Hide 'People You May Know'
filters.description: Filter the 'People You May Know' story that appears in the News Feed occasionally.

condition.text: (.*(?:^(.*) commented on this\.(?:(?! \2 $).)*$|was mentioned in a post|was live| likes | liked |reacted to this|was tagged in|replied to a comment).*)

filters.title: Friend Activity Stories
filters.description: Filter stories about things your friends liked, were tagged in, etc, but which they didn't actually create.

filters.title: Saved Posts Reminder
filters.description: Hide posts in the News Feed that highlight things you've recently Saved to Facebook, which they are reminding you about.

rules.DOC: This uses separate clauses to facilitate capture of the post 'title' as ${1}.  If it falls all the way through to here and catches one of these CSS matches, the user sees literally '${1}' as the 'title' of the hidden post; nothing can be done about that.

actions.DOC: Both of these action records contain tab & note configs, so people can choose one or the other or both without having to do any heavy lifting.  'custom_nyet' property will be used later to give custom 'hide it again' strings.

filters.title: Wordle
filters.description: Hide (or move to tab) posts from Wordle, Quordle, Nerdle, and several similar games
